thothbot.parallax.core.shared.cameras

Class CombinedCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.objects.Object3D
      • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.cameras.Camera
        • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.cameras.CombinedCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, HasEventBus, ViewportResizeHandler, DimensionalObject

    public class CombinedCamera
extends Camera
    A general perpose camera, for setting FOV, Lens Focal Length, and switching between perspective and orthographic views easily.

    Use this only if you do not wish to manage both an Orthographic and Perspective Camera

    The code based on three.js code.

    Author:
    thothbot
